title: Anyone Can Cook: Step-By-Step Recipes Just for You
description: An innovative cookbook for aspiring chefs introduces the basics of working in a kitchen with practical advice on kitchen equipment, food safety, pantry essentials, and ingredients, along with more than five hundred super-easy recipes, highlighted by nearly one thousand step-by-step photographs, detailed instructions, and nutritional breakdowns for delicious, home-cooked meals.
author: Better Homes and Gardens
